Posts.EditableText: I've begun to have a play with Alex's Squiffy project (here, https://github.com/textadventures/squiffy ). I'm hoping to use it for the ShuffleComp over at Intfiction. Anyone else had a go with it? If you're not familiar it's for creating hyperlink choice games. it has a simple syntax in the game file and you can add bells and whistles with Javascript if you wish.
Posts.HTML:
I've begun to have a play with Alex's Squiffy project (here, https://github.com/textadventures/squiffy ). I'm hoping to use it for the ShuffleComp over at Intfiction. Anyone else had a go with it?

If you're not familiar it's for creating hyperlink choice games. it has a simple syntax in the game file and you can add bells and whistles with Javascript if you wish.
